subject: Order #SSN5320
description_text:
Hi guys,

Thanks for confirming my order. I have originally ordered black pedals, can
you please change these to silver?

Thanks you :)

conversations.body_text: Hi Josh Castle,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has already been shipped, and we are unable to make any further modifications.

Hi guys,

My pedals arrived today, however, the haptic motors I’ve ordered haven’t
arrived & are unable to track with the given shipping number. Mentioning
it’s expired?

Can you please resolve, otherwise I’ll demand a refund.

Shipping number for haptic motors: SF6047202971916

On Wednesday, December 31, 2025, service@simsonn.com
Hi Josh Castle,  Your package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive within the next few days. Below is your tracking link: ​https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047202971916
